General.Name: Grupo Gicsa S.A. de C.V
General.Description: Grupo Gicsa S.A.B. de C.V. develops real estate properties in Mexico. It also provides construction and renovation services; property rental services; and real estate administration, operation, and maintenance services. The company was founded in 1989 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Paseo de los Tamarindos No. 90, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 05120
